definitions.definition: the state of feeling annoyed, impatient, or angry.
examples: annoyance, exasperation, vexation, indignation, impatience, crossness, displeasure, chagrin, pique; Moreanger, rage, fury, wrath, aggravation; literaryire "she tried not to show her irritation"Moreanger, rage, fury, wrath, aggravation; ire she tried not to show her irritation

definitions.definition: the production of inflammation or other discomfort in a bodily part or organ.
the stimulation of an organism, cell, or organ to produce an active response.
